job_description: NetApp, one of the world’s leading data storage and data management companies, creates innovative products – storage systems and software – that help customers around the world store, manage, protect, and retain one of their most precious corporate assets: their data.NetApp's Vancouver Technology Center is pioneering the development of advanced object storage technologies which handle ever-increasing demands for storage capacity while dramatically simplifying storage and data management.  Join the team and become part of the company ranked #3 on the Best Workplaces in Canada, and #6 on FORTUNE’s 100 Best Companies to Work For list.Our co-op program aims to help you achieve three key goals: gain understanding about the NetApp business, gain knowledge about the specific role and organization in which you will work, and engage and socialize with the community of co-ops and employees at various events such as our monthly beer bashes.Working alongside engineers with years of experience in the industry, you will learn about the latest data storage technologies and employ state-of-the-art development and testing tools and best practices.  Agile Scrum, continuous integration, automated testing, C++/OO development, and large-scale global software development are just a few of the things you will be exposed to.Co-ops at NetApp are integrated with our core engineering teams, taking on roles such as software design and implementation, defect investigation and resolution, testing, tools development, and technology investigations.We have the following opportunities open for the upcoming term:Software Development CoopTerms are available for 4 or 8 months.
